author: Andrew Dunn
title: A buzzy Seattle biotech is teaming up with Microsoft and Amgen to hunt for 'the Michael Jordan of antibodies' to fight the coronavirus (AMGN, ADPT)
description: The Seattle biotech company Adaptive Biotechnologies has started research on a coronavirus therapeutic that could halt the spread of the virus. The small company has inked partnerships with industry behemoths to accelerate its work. It's working with Amgen, t…
content:
To counter the coronavirus pandemic, drug companies are designing therapeutics to attack the virus.
One upstart biotech is hunting for "the Michael Jordan of antibodies" to turn into a coronavirus drug. Adaptive Biotechnologies recently teamed up with Amgen,… [+5314 chars]
